arts.ttl: Birmingham City player ratings after Stansfield scores again to send Blues top
arts.sum: A shirt pull on Crawley forward William Swan in first half stoppage time means Klarer will be banned for Blues’ match against Burton Albion on Boxing Day. Blues started the second half more purposefully and Paik Seung-ho worked Wollacott with a cross-cum-shot after a clever corner routine with Willum Willumsson.

arts.ttl: Birmingham beat Crawley to move top of table
Birmingham City dealt blow with key player to miss Burton on Boxing Day
arts.sum: Crawley was Blues’ 19th league match of the season which is the cut off point for five yellow cards resulting in a ban. Christoph Klarer will miss Birmingham City’s match against Burton Albion on Boxing Day after collecting his fifth booking of the season at Crawley.

arts.ttl: The EFL have taken action to avoid Birmingham City transfer repeat
arts.sum: SCMP is the Financial Fair Play framework in place for clubs in Leagues One and Two and sets out the percentage of a club’s turnover that can be spent on player-related expenditure. An EFL statement said: “Following a commitment made by League One and Two clubs in the summer to support proactive measures to stem financial losses, representatives from the divisions have today agreed amendments to Salary Cost Management Protocol (SCMP) rules.

arts.ttl: Chris Davies laments ‘not ideal’ situation and highlights ‘two decisions I’m pleased I made’
arts.sum: “It gives them a three-day advantage and it’s not ideal for us, and I’m sure they would feel the same if they had a game on a Monday night at eight o’clock down there,” said Blues manager Davies. “It’s more preparation time for the opposition, or our rivals if you like, but at the end of the day you need to play the games anyway.

arts.ttl: Birmingham City transfer latest as Chris Davies talks meetings and Dion Sanderson’s future
arts.sum: “Myself, Craig Gardner and the recruitment team always meet to discuss where the squad is at and we’re looking forward to future transfer windows to have a good picture and make sure we’re planned,” Davies said. The future of the club’s former captain, Dion Sanderson, is one of the hottest topics going into January.

arts.ttl: Preview: Crawley Town vs. Birmingham City - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Monday's League One clash between Crawley Town and Birmingham City, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
